principles: Automation: use Swift-based launchpad/scratch tools (SPM) and avoid Python for repository automation.

items: \- Task breakdown: Public-backed services (Profile, Positions, Activity, Orders) + adapters. \- Dependencies: PublicLib APIs (done), TradierLib reference (done). \- Risks: Field normalization differences; ensure adapters consolidate units/timestamps. \- QA plan: Fixture-driven tests; smoke wiring in example app.
